actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
House Committee on District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to give to the Board of Parole for the District of Columbia exclusive power and authority to release on parole, to terminate the parole of, and to modify the terms and conditions of the parole of, prisoners convicted of violating any of the District of Columbia, or any law of the United States applicable exclusively to the District.

summary.text: Empowers the Board of Parole for the District of Columbia with exclusive authority to release on parole, terminate the parole of, and to modify the terms and conditions of the parole of, any prisoner convicted for violating a District of Columbia law, or a Federal law applicable exclusively to the District.

titles.title: A bill to give to the Board of Parole for the District of Columbia exclusive power and authority to release on parole, to terminate the parole of, and to modify the terms and conditions of the parole of, prisoners convicted of violating any of the District of Columbia, or any law of the United States applicable exclusively to the District.
